mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E2.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\eta^{2}_{aniso}=\frac{1}{u_{max}-u_{min}}\int\limits_{u_{min}}^{%
u_{max}}\frac{\langle\Phi^{2}(u_{\phi},u_{r})-\Phi^{2}(u_{r})\rangle_{u_{\phi}%
}}{\Phi^{2}(u_{r})}\,\textrm{d}u_{r}" display="inline"><mrow><msubsup><mi>η</mi><mrow><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>n</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>o</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mrow><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>-</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mfrac></mstyle><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><munderover><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∫</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub><msub><mi>u</mi><mrow><mi>m</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>a</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub></munderover></mstyle><mrow><mpadded width="+1.7pt"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><msub><mrow><mo stretchy="false">⟨</mo><mrow><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Φ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>ϕ</mi></msub><mo>,</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>r</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>-</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Φ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>r</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow><mo stretchy="false">⟩</mo></mrow><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>ϕ</mi></msub></msub><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">Φ</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>r</mi></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mpadded><mo>⁢</mo><mtext>d</mtext><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>u</mi><mi>r</mi></msub></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></math>

nexttext: where $w_j$ is the processing weight applied to the $j$th receiver, $\alpha$ is the attenuation of seawater, $r_{ij}$ is the distance (slant range) from pixel $i$ to receiver $j$, $b_{tx}(\phi_{ij})$ and $b_{rx}(\phi_{ij})$ are the transmit and receive horizontal beam patterns, and $b_{tx}(\theta_{ij})$ and $b_{rx}(\theta_{ij})$ are the vertical beam patterns. The variables $\phi_{ij}$, and $\theta_{ij}$, are the horizontal and depression angles from the sensor $j$ and pixel $i$ in the sonar's coordinate system. The HISAS 1030 sonar has a single transmitter and multiple receivers. The phase-center approximation \citep{bellettini_pinto_2002} is employed to work with an equivalent monostatic configuration with colocated transmitters and receiver. The unaveraged scattering cross section, $\tilde{\sigma}$, is related to $q_{i}$ through
mathml:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" id="S0.E3.m1" class="ltx_Math" alttext="\displaystyle\begin{split}\displaystyle q_{i}&\displaystyle=\left(\sum\limits_%
{j}^{Nr}w_{j}b_{tx}(\phi_{ij})b_{rx}(\phi_{ij})\right)^{-1}\times\\
&\displaystyle\left(\sum\limits_{j}^{Nr}w_{j}b_{tx}(\phi_{ij})b_{rx}(\phi_{ij}%
)\frac{r^{2}_{ij}e^{2\alpha r_{ij}}}{\left|b_{tx}(\theta_{ij})b_{rx}(\theta_{%
ij})\right|}v_{ij}\right)\end{split}" display="inline"><mtable columnspacing="0pt" rowspacing="0pt"><mtr><mtd columnalign="right"><msub><mi>q</mi><mi>i</mi></msub></mtd><mtd columnalign="left"><mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><munderover><mo largeop="true" movablelimits="false" symmetric="true">∑</mo><mi>j</mi><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></munderover></mstyle><msub><mi>w</mi><mi>j</mi></msub><msub><mi>b</mi><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>ϕ</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>j</mi></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><msub><mi>b</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mrow><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>ϕ</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>j</mi></mrow></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>×</mo></mrow></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd/><mtd columnalign="left"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mstyle symmetric="true">∑</mo><mi>j</mi><mrow><mi>N</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>r</mi></mrow></munderover></mstyle><mrow><msub><mi>w</mi><mi>j</mi></msub><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>b</mi><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><msubsup><mi>r</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>j</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msubsup><mo>⁢</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>⁢</mo><mi>α</mi><mo>⁢</mo><msub><mi>r</mi><mrow><mi>i</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>j</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mo>|</mo><mrow><msub><mi>b</mi><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>⁢</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msub><mo>⁢</mo><mrow><mo
